ValidationRule.description: If IO is not approved and dually signed, you cannot change a direct opportunity to closed won.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
$Setup.byPass__c.ByPass_Validation__c = FALSE,
RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_DIRECT,
ISBLANK( IO__c ),
ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won'),
$Profile.Name <> "System Administrator - Limited Privileges", $User.LastName <> "Adkins"
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot change stage to Closed Won if an IO is not present
